document_data.name: Ophal
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ophal''' family of [[Amn]] was one of the High Houses sitting at the [[Council of Five (Amn)|Council of Five]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Ophals were successful [[:Category:Merchants|merchants]], notably dealing in [[spice]] and [[:Category:Food and drink|food]].
document_data.Base of Operations:
The primary estate of the family was located in the capital city of [[Athkatla]], It also was also present in [[Trademeet]] and [[Crimmor]].

In Crimmor, the Ophals held a major influence and were considered one of the three 'grand families' of the city.{{Cite dragon/334/Crimmor: City of Caravans|24-25}} They were respected but also feared, with citizens going so far as to nickname [[Zharnn Ophal]] "the [[Dragon]] Lady".{{Cite dragon/334/Crimmor: City of Caravans|34}}
document_data.Possessions: The family possessed a large estate on the [[Waft]], a major commercial street of the [[Athkatla/Trades District|Trades District]] of Athkatla.{{Cite dungeon/88/Thirds of Purloined Vellum|50-51}} It also occupied [[Durndraaven Manor]] in Crimmor.{{Cite dragon/334/Crimmor: City of Caravans|27}}
document_data.Relationships:
Due to the close relationship between money, trading and power in Amn, the Ophals had strong relationships with several other major families. They were on friendly terms with the [[Bladesmile]]s and [[Coprith]]s. They were regularly opposed by the [[Crytrapper]], [[Ulvax]], [[Vymmar]] and [[Zoar]] families.

[[File:Zarnn ophal.png|thumb|right|130px|''[[Zharnn Ophal]], the Dragon Lady'']]
document_data.History: During the {{YearlinkName|1238}} a fierce dispute over the rights to the [[Zakharan]] spice trade opposed the Ophals to the Ulvax family. It was the beginning of a century-long feud including several other incidents, until the [[Murann Spice War]] of [[1388 DR]] caused so many casualties that the [[Council of Six (Amn)|Council of Six]] had to intervene.

Members.Mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]:
* [[Zharnn Ophal]] was the head of the family.
* [[Daerea Ethgil]], [[Five Furies|Fury]] of [[Goldspires]] and twin sister of Zharnn.
* [[Ressic Ophal]], a spice merchant and member of the [[Shadow Thieves of Amn|Shadow Thieves]].
* [[Shareen Ophal]] and her husband [[Dermod Ophal|Dermod]], residents of Athkatla.
